name.baseName: Veterinary cooking extracts ; Chinese medicine tablets ; Extraction (using organic solvents) ; less than 200 t - Chinese herbal pieces/a; NESPS2
兽用煮提产物 ; 中药饮片 ; 提取（使用有机溶剂） ; 小于200吨中药饮片/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)

common:classification.common:class: Health, social services, beauty and wellness

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 描述的工业过程涉及使用有机溶剂提取中药材，生产年产量不足200吨的兽用煮提产品。末端处理技术用于处理生产过程中产生的废水和废气。所述治疗方法的污染物包括化学需氧量（COD）、氨氮、总磷、有机结合氮和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）。引用的处理方法包括好氧生物处理、厌氧生物处理、物化处理、吸收、导流、冷凝、半封闭式覆盖收集以及封闭式房间收集。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,三级代码275.0文件，在完整版文件中第3158页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Chemical Oxygen DemandisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标需氧量的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisCondensation + absorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标有组织挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是冷凝法+吸收+分流，其效率为94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为有组织挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为有组织挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisConfined room collection + absorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标无组织挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是密闭间收集+吸收，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为无组织挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为无组织挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisSemi-closed cover collection + absorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标无组织挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是半密闭罩收集+吸收，其效率为65，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为无组织挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为无组织挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management83，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标有组织挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸收+分流，其效率为83，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为有组织挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为有组织挥发性有机物
nan
源文件中描述为为中药饮片，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
